class.name: TextServerExtension
class.brief_description: Base class for TextServer custom implementations (plugins).
class.description: External TextServer implementations should inherit from this class.

method.name: create_font
method.description: Creates new, empty font cache entry resource. To free the resulting resourec, use [method free_rid] method.

method.name: create_shaped_text
method.description: Creates new buffer for complex text layout, with the given [code]direction[/code] and [code]orientation[/code]. To free the resulting buffer, use [method free_rid] method.

method.name: draw_hex_code_box
method.description: Draws box displaying character hexadecimal code. Used for replacing missing characters. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: font_clear_glyphs
method.description: Removes all rendered glyphs information from the cache entry.

method.name: font_clear_kerning_map
method.description: Removes all kerning overrides.

method.name: font_clear_size_cache
method.description: Removes all font sizes from the cache entry.

method.name: font_clear_textures
method.description: Removes all textures from font cache entry.

method.name: font_draw_glyph
method.description: Draws single glyph into a canvas item at the position, using [code]font_rid[/code] at the size [code]size[/code].

method.name: font_draw_glyph_outline
method.description: Draws single glyph outline of size [code]outline_size[/code] into a canvas item at the position, using [code]font_rid[/code] at the size [code]size[/code].

method.name: font_get_ascent
method.description: Returns the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: font_get_descent
method.description: Returns the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: font_get_embolden
method.description: Returns font embolden strength.

method.name: font_get_face_count
method.description: Returns number of faces in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: font_get_face_index
method.description: Returns an active face index in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: font_get_fixed_size
method.description: Returns bitmap font fixed size.

method.name: font_get_generate_mipmaps
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if font texture mipmap generation is enabled.

method.name: font_get_global_oversampling
method.description: Returns the font oversampling factor, shared by all fonts in the TextServer.

method.name: font_get_glyph_advance
method.description: Returns glyph advance (offset of the next glyph).

method.name: font_get_glyph_contours
method.description: Returns outline contours of the glyph as a [code]Dictionary[/code] with the following contents: [code]points[/code] - [PackedVector3Array], containing outline points. [code]x[/code] and [code]y[/code] are point coordinates. [code]z[/code] is the type of the point, using the [enum TextServer.ContourPointTag] values. [code]contours[/code] - [PackedInt32Array], containing indices the end points of each contour. [code]orientation[/code] - [bool], contour orientation. If [code]true[/code], clockwise contours must be filled.

method.name: font_get_glyph_index
method.description: Returns the glyph index of a [code]char[/code], optionally modified by the [code]variation_selector[/code].

method.name: font_get_glyph_list
method.description: Returns list of rendered glyphs in the cache entry.

method.name: font_get_glyph_offset
method.description: Returns glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: font_get_glyph_size
method.description: Returns size of the glyph.

method.name: font_get_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Returns index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: font_get_glyph_texture_rid
method.description: Returns resource id of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: font_get_glyph_texture_size
method.description: Returns size of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: font_get_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Returns rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: font_get_hinting
method.description: Returns the font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: font_get_kerning
method.description: Returns kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: font_get_kerning_list
method.description: Returns list of the kerning overrides.

method.name: font_get_language_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]language[/code].

method.name: font_get_language_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of language support overrides.

method.name: font_get_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: Returns the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: font_get_msdf_size
method.description: Returns source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: font_get_name
method.description: Returns font family name.

method.name: font_get_opentype_feature_overrides
method.description: Returns font OpenType feature set override.

method.name: font_get_oversampling
method.description: Returns font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: font_get_scale
method.description: Returns scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: font_get_script_support_override
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [code]script[/code].

method.name: font_get_script_support_overrides
method.description: Returns list of script support overrides.

method.name: font_get_size_cache_list
method.description: Returns list of the font sizes in the cache. Each size is [code]Vector2i[/code] with font size and outline size.

method.name: font_get_spacing
method.description: Returns extra spacing added between glyphs in pixels.

method.name: font_get_style
method.description: Returns font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: font_get_style_name
method.description: Returns font style name.

method.name: font_get_subpixel_positioning
method.description: Returns font sub-pixel glyph positioning mode.

method.name: font_get_supported_chars
method.description: Returns a string containing all the characters available in the font.

method.name: font_get_texture_count
method.description: Returns number of textures used by font cache entry.

method.name: font_get_texture_image
method.description: Returns font cache texture image data.

method.name: font_get_texture_offsets
method.description: Returns array containing the first free pixel in the each column of texture. Should be the same size as texture width or empty.

method.name: font_get_transform
method.description: Returns 2D transform applied to the font outlines.

method.name: font_get_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: font_get_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: font_get_variation_coordinates
method.description: Returns variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method font_supported_variation_list] for more info.

method.name: font_has_char
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a Unicode [code]char[/code] is available in the font.

method.name: font_is_antialiased
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if font 8-bit anitialiased glyph rendering is supported and enabled.

method.name: font_is_force_autohinter
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if auto-hinting is supported and preferred over font built-in hinting. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: font_is_language_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given language ([url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1]ISO 639[/url] code).

method.name: font_is_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data.

method.name: font_is_script_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given script (ISO 15924 code).

method.name: font_remove_glyph
method.description: Removes specified rendered glyph information from the cache entry.

method.name: font_remove_kerning
method.description: Removes kerning override for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: font_remove_language_support_override
method.description: Remove language support override.

method.name: font_remove_script_support_override
method.description: Removes script support override.

method.name: font_remove_size_cache
method.description: Removes specified font size from the cache entry.

method.name: font_remove_texture
method.description: Removes specified texture from font cache entry.

method.name: font_render_glyph
method.description: Renders specified glyph to the font cache texture.

method.name: font_render_range
method.description: Renders the range of characters to the font cache texture.

method.name: font_set_antialiased
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], 8-bit antialiased glyph rendering is used, otherwise 1-bit rendering is used. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: font_set_ascent
method.description: Sets the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: font_set_data
method.description: Sets font source data, e.g contents of the dynamic font source file.

method.name: font_set_data_ptr
method.description: Sets font source data, e.g contents of the dynamic font source file. [code]data_ptr[/code] memory buffer must remain accessible during font lifetime.

method.name: font_set_descent
method.description: Sets the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: font_set_embolden
method.description: Sets font embolden strength. If [code]strength[/code] is not equal to zero, emboldens the font outlines. Negative values reduce the outline thickness.

method.name: font_set_face_index
method.description: Sets an active face index in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: font_set_fixed_size
method.description: Sets bitmap font fixed size. If set to value greater than zero, same cache entry will be used for all font sizes.

method.name: font_set_force_autohinter
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] auto-hinting is preferred over font built-in hinting.

method.name: font_set_generate_mipmaps
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] font texture mipmap generation is enabled.

method.name: font_set_global_oversampling
method.description: Sets oversampling factor, shared by all font in the TextServer. [b]Note:[/b] This value can be automatically changed by display server.

method.name: font_set_glyph_advance
method.description: Sets glyph advance (offset of the next glyph).

method.name: font_set_glyph_offset
method.description: Sets glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: font_set_glyph_size
method.description: Sets size of the glyph.

method.name: font_set_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: Sets index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: font_set_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: Sets rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: font_set_hinting
method.description: Sets font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: font_set_kerning
method.description: Sets kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: font_set_language_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method font_is_language_supported].

method.name: font_set_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: Sets the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: font_set_msdf_size
method.description: Sets source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: font_set_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code], glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data. MSDF rendering allows displaying the font at any scaling factor without blurriness, and without incurring a CPU cost when the font size changes (since the font no longer needs to be rasterized on the CPU). As a downside, font hinting is not available with MSDF. The lack of font hinting may result in less crisp and less readable fonts at small sizes. [b]Note:[/b] MSDF font rendering does not render glyphs with overlapping shapes correctly. Overlapping shapes are not valid per the OpenType standard, but are still commonly found in many font files, especially those converted by Google Fonts. To avoid issues with overlapping glyphs, consider downloading the font file directly from the type foundry instead of relying on Google Fonts.

method.name: font_set_name
method.description: Sets the font family name.

method.name: font_set_opentype_feature_overrides
method.description: Sets font OpenType feature set override.

method.name: font_set_oversampling
method.description: Sets font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: font_set_scale
method.description: Sets scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: font_set_script_support_override
method.description: Adds override for [method font_is_script_supported].

method.name: font_set_spacing
method.description: Sets extra spacing added between glyphs in pixels.

method.name: font_set_style
method.description: Sets the font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: font_set_style_name
method.description: Sets the font style name.

method.name: font_set_subpixel_positioning
method.description: Sets font sub-pixel glyph positioning mode.

method.name: font_set_texture_image
method.description: Sets font cache texture image data.

method.name: font_set_texture_offsets
method.description: Sets array containing the first free pixel in the each column of texture. Should be the same size as texture width or empty.

method.name: font_set_transform
method.description: Sets 2D transform, applied to the font outlines, can be used for slanting, flipping and rotating glyphs. For example, to simulate italic typeface by slanting, apply the following transform [code]Transform2D(1.0, slant, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0)[/code].

method.name: font_set_underline_position
method.description: Sets pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: font_set_underline_thickness
method.description: Sets thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: font_set_variation_coordinates
method.description: Sets variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry. See [method font_supported_variation_list] for more info.

method.name: font_supported_feature_list
method.description: Returns the dictionary of the supported OpenType features.

method.name: font_supported_variation_list
method.description: Returns the dictionary of the supported OpenType variation coordinates.

method.name: format_number
method.description: Converts a number from the Western Arabic (0..9) to the numeral systems used in [code]language[/code].

method.name: free_rid
method.description: Frees an object created by this [TextServer].

method.name: get_features
method.description: Returns text server features, see [enum TextServer.Feature].

method.name: get_hex_code_box_size
method.description: Returns size of the replacement character (box with character hexadecimal code that is drawn in place of invalid characters). [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: get_name
method.description: Returns the name of the server interface.

method.name: get_support_data_filename
method.description: Returns default TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) filename.

method.name: get_support_data_info
method.description: Returns TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) description.

method.name: has
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]rid[/code] is valid resource owned by this text server.

method.name: has_feature
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the server supports a feature.

method.name: is_locale_right_to_left
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if locale is right-to-left.

method.name: load_support_data
method.description: Loads optional TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries).

method.name: name_to_tag
method.description: Converts readable feature, variation, script or language name to OpenType tag.

method.name: parse_number
method.description: Converts a number from the numeral systems used in [code]language[/code] to Western Arabic (0..9).

method.name: percent_sign
method.description: Returns percent sign used in the [code]language[/code].

method.name: save_support_data
method.description: Saves optional TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) to the file. [b]Note:[/b] This function is used by during project export, to include TextServer database.

method.name: shaped_get_span_count
method.description: Returns number of text spans added using [method shaped_text_add_string] or [method shaped_text_add_object].

method.name: shaped_get_span_meta
method.description: Returns text span metadata.

method.name: shaped_set_span_update_font
method.description: Changes text span font, font size and OpenType features, without changing the text.

method.name: shaped_text_add_object
method.description: Adds inline object to the text buffer, [code]key[/code] must be unique. In the text, object is represented as [code]length[/code] object replacement characters.

method.name: shaped_text_add_string
method.description: Adds text span and font to draw it to the text buffer.

method.name: shaped_text_clear
method.description: Clears text buffer (removes text and inline objects).

method.name: shaped_text_draw
method.description: Draw shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [code]color[/code]. [code]pos[/code] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout). [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_draw_outline
method.description: Draw the outline of the shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [code]color[/code]. [code]pos[/code] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout). [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_fit_to_width
method.description: Adjusts text with to fit to specified width, returns new text width.

method.name: shaped_text_get_ascent
method.description: Returns the text ascent (number of pixels above the baseline for horizontal layout or to the left of baseline for vertical).

method.name: shaped_text_get_carets
method.description: Returns shapes of the carets corresponding to the character offset [code]position[/code] in the text. Returned caret shape is 1 pixel wide rectangle. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_get_custom_punctuation
method.description: Returns custom punctuation character list, used for word breaking. If set to empty string, server defaults are used.

method.name: shaped_text_get_descent
method.description: Returns the text descent (number of pixels below the baseline for horizontal layout or to the right of baseline for vertical).

method.name: shaped_text_get_direction
method.description: Returns direction of the text.

method.name: shaped_text_get_dominant_direction_in_range
method.description: Returns dominant direction of in the range of text. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_get_ellipsis_glyph_count
method.description: Returns number of glyphs in the ellipsis.

method.name: shaped_text_get_ellipsis_glyphs
method.description: Returns array of the glyphs in the ellipsis.

method.name: shaped_text_get_ellipsis_pos
method.description: Returns position of the ellipsis.

method.name: shaped_text_get_glyph_count
method.description: Returns number of glyphs in the buffer.

method.name: shaped_text_get_glyphs
method.description: Returns an array of glyphs in the visual order.

method.name: shaped_text_get_grapheme_bounds
method.description: Returns composite character's bounds as offsets from the start of the line. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_get_inferred_direction
method.description: Returns direction of the text, inferred by the BiDi algorithm.

method.name: shaped_text_get_line_breaks
method.description: Breaks text to the lines and returns character ranges for each line. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_get_line_breaks_adv
method.description: Breaks text to the lines and columns. Returns character ranges for each segment. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_get_object_rect
method.description: Returns bounding rectangle of the inline object.

method.name: shaped_text_get_objects
method.description: Returns array of inline objects.

method.name: shaped_text_get_orientation
method.description: eturns text orientation.

method.name: shaped_text_get_parent
method.description: Returns the parent buffer from which the substring originates.

method.name: shaped_text_get_preserve_control
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display control characters.

method.name: shaped_text_get_preserve_invalid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display hexadecimal codes in place of invalid characters. [b]Note:[/b] If set to [code]false[/code], nothing is displayed in place of invalid characters.

method.name: shaped_text_get_range
method.description: Returns substring buffer character range in the parent buffer.

method.name: shaped_text_get_selection
method.description: Returns selection rectangles for the specified character range. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_get_size
method.description: Returns size of the text.

method.name: shaped_text_get_trim_pos
method.description: Returns the position of the overrun trim.

method.name: shaped_text_get_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: shaped_text_get_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline.

method.name: shaped_text_get_width
method.description: Returns width (for horizontal layout) or height (for vertical) of the text.

method.name: shaped_text_get_word_breaks
method.description: Breaks text into words and returns array of character ranges. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_hit_test_grapheme
method.description: Returns grapheme index at the specified pixel offset at the baseline, or [code]-1[/code] if none is found. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_hit_test_position
method.description: Returns caret character offset at the specified pixel offset at the baseline. This function always returns a valid position. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_is_ready
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if buffer is successfully shaped.

method.name: shaped_text_next_grapheme_pos
method.description: Returns composite character end position closest to the [code]pos[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_overrun_trim_to_width
method.description: Trims text if it exceeds the given width.

method.name: shaped_text_prev_grapheme_pos
method.description: Returns composite character start position closest to the [code]pos[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: shaped_text_resize_object
method.description: Sets new size and alignment of embedded object.

method.name: shaped_text_set_bidi_override
method.description: Overrides BiDi for the structured text. Override ranges should cover full source text without overlaps. BiDi algorithm will be used on each range separately.

method.name: shaped_text_set_custom_punctuation
method.description: Sets custom punctuation character list, used for word breaking. If set to empty string, server defaults are used.

method.name: shaped_text_set_direction
method.description: Sets desired text direction. If set to [code]TEXT_DIRECTION_AUTO[/code], direction will be detected based on the buffer contents and current locale.

method.name: shaped_text_set_orientation
method.description: Sets desired text orientation.

method.name: shaped_text_set_preserve_control
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display control characters.

method.name: shaped_text_set_preserve_invalid
method.description: If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display invalid characters as hexadecimal codes, otherwise nothing is displayed.

method.name: shaped_text_shape
method.description: Shapes buffer if it's not shaped. Returns [code]true[/code] if the string is shaped successfully.

method.name: shaped_text_sort_logical
method.description: Returns text glyphs in the logical order.

method.name: shaped_text_substr
method.description: Returns text buffer for the substring of the text in the [code]shaped[/code] text buffer (including inline objects).

method.name: shaped_text_tab_align
method.description: Aligns shaped text to the given tab-stops.

method.name: shaped_text_update_breaks
method.description: Updates line breaking positions in the text buffer. [b]Note:[/b] This method is used by default line/word breaking methods, and its implementation might be omitted if custom line breaking in implemented.

method.name: shaped_text_update_justification_ops
method.description: Updates line justification positions (word breaks and elongations) in the text buffer. [b]Note:[/b] This method is used by default line/word breaking methods, and its implementation might be omitted if custom line breaking in implemented.

method.name: string_get_word_breaks
method.description: Returns array of the word break character offsets.

method.name: string_to_lower
method.description: Returns the string converted to lowercase.

method.name: string_to_upper
method.description: Returns the string converted to uppercase.

method.name: strip_diacritics
method.description: Strips diacritics from the string. [b]Note:[/b] If this method is not implemented in the plugin, the default implementation will be used.

method.name: tag_to_name
method.description: Converts OpenType tag to readable feature, variation, script or language name.
